skins.shipDescription: Lexington-class aircraft carrier ©` Saratoga, Hull Number CV-3!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am aircraft carrier Lexington's little sister, Saratoga! Hmm... I like to play pranks! But you already knew that, Commander~ Pioneer of aviation tactics? If my sister hadn't passed away so soon, that title would've definitely been hers.
skins.acquisition: Hey there, and good day, Commander! I am Lexington...'s little sister, Saratoga~ If there's nothing important, I'm leaving now
skins.login: Oh my~ Sorry Commander. I didn't mean to launch planes at you on purpose~
skins.details: If you keep on peeping where you shouldn't, even kids will not be talking to you~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Boo! Hehe, did I susprise you? Commander, you're slow, aren't you?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, don't confuse me with my big sister!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Eh? Call you 'big bro'? There's no way that's happening~
skins.secretaryTouch: My stature may be small, but I've yet to grow past that fact!

skins.shipDescription: Sister Sara is leaving her nest and going in a new direction! I'm now making my official debut as Saratoga: The Little Witch Idol! I'm leaving my PR to you, Commander~
skins.acquisition: Sister Sara is leaving her nest and going in a new direction! I'm now making my official debut as Saratoga: The Little Witch Idol! I'm leaving my PR to you, Commander~
skins.login: Whoosh! Commander, what do you think of Sister Sara's welcoming flight formation?
skins.details: A signature victory pose and catch phrase are essential parts of a magical girl's arsenal! Commander, help me come up with something~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, how about we make all the younger Eagle Union carriers into magical girls as well~? Hehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's time for Magical Sister Saratoga's invincible catch phrase - even if you can't see the light, it'll definitely be all right! ...Opinions?
skins.secretaryIdle3: There's nothing better than sharing Sister Sara's smiles and energy with the world!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, my wand would probably feel great when used like a baseball bat or a crowbar... Wanna let me try~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Aww, Sister Sara's not fit to be a bride anymore~

skins.shipDescription: Even if we don't get to relax on holiday, it's always good to have a swimsuit! Ok, let's go! Are you ready to swim?
skins.acquisition: Even in a day off, I'm not loosening up! Phew... Swimsuit, check. All preparations complete! Launch time! I'll show you Sister Sara's power!
skins.login: Commander, let's head to the beach today! I want to eat chilled watermelon!
skins.details: Commander...? Thank you for before. As an Eagle Union carrier, I shouldn't be feeling down after losing in beach volleyball! ...Yep! Saratoga, launching again!
skins.secretaryIdle1: When you talk about a sport to play on the beach, it has to be this!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, how about we get into the sea? I'll borrow you my lifesaver!
skins.secretaryIdle3: W-Wales? Why are you hugging me suddenly... I've grown 'bigger'? Really? That's right! I have grown bigger after all!
skins.secretaryTouch: In beach volleyball...I l-lost to destroyers... my sister isn't here... Commander, can I cry on your shoulder for a while?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander! Saratoga won! Come and see! I beat Honolulu! She can't believe it!

skins.shipDescription: Hey everyone~! This time, Sister Sara has brought you fashion from a faraway land! Commander, what do you think of it?
skins.acquisition: Hey everyone~! This time, Sister Sara has brought you fashion from a faraway land! Commander, what do you think of it?
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander~! The prank this time... is a perfectly ordinary and prank-free greeting~!
skins.details: It's a little bit hard to play pranks on people with an outfit like this, what should I do... Woah! Commander, when'd you get here!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sure enough, a black ribbon suits Sister sara the best!
skins.secretaryIdle2: As a special service for the hardworking commander... Sister Sara's smile will wash away your fatigue! How do you feel? Teehee~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, what are you fantasizing about right now? C'mon, you can tell me!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I hope your attention isn't focused on some place weird?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Woah! Commander, what are you trying to do to your cute little Sara?

skins.shipDescription: HAI DOMO~! I°Øm the virtual idol, Saratoga! Well, Commander, what do you think? I asked Kizuna AI to make this dress specifically for me, modeled after her outfit!
skins.acquisition: HAI DOMO~! I°Øm the virtual idol, Saratoga! Well, Commander, what do you think? I asked Kizuna AI to make this dress specifically for me, modeled after her outfit!
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander! I'm about to go watch Kizuna AI rehearse the lyrics for her next performance! It's a rare opportunity, so you should come along too!
skins.details: A virtual idol has to make a good first impression... Long Island, show me some of those cool poses you're always talking about?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Since I don't usually get this opportunity, maybe I should try to record a song for an anime~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: A new opportunity? An idol only shines because of her courage! We can't be afraid to try new things!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Heh heh, the enemy's wide open! Pyoko Pyoko, go get 'em~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Since I've finally become a virtual idol, maybe I should release some new songs~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Uwah...! Commander, where are you touching?! Eh? This is the only way to determine if I'm the real deal...? Not like this...
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Uwah! Don't pull Pyoko Pyoko off my head~! Commander... you definitely can't treat the real Kizuna AI like this, got it?

skins.shipDescription: Friends of the blue sea and sky, your guardian angel and idol Sara has arrived! Ehehe~ Commander, join me in protecting the beauty of the blue seas!
skins.acquisition: Friends of the blue sea and sky, your guardian angel and idol Sara has arrived! Ehehe~ Commander, join me in protecting the beauty of the blue seas!
skins.login: Whoosh! Ehehe~ Did you like our passionate welcoming fanfare?
skins.details: I spent a lot of time learning things about the sea! If you have a marine-related question, just ask, Commander! Professor Sara can teach you anything! Ehehe?
skins.secretaryIdle1: It feels great to pet these cuties! Don't you wanna give it a try as well, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: The sea is colored navy blue, and in this moment, Sara is a true marine idol! Heheh?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh yeah, I saw a seal while on patrol the other day! You should come see it with me next time, Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Waaah?! ... Heh, hehehe... You just gave me a great excuse to test out my new gear...

skins.shipDescription: Merry Christmas! Here comes Christmas Sara, shining like a star in the silent night! Hehehe, how's that for a holiday greeting? So, have you decided where we're gonna spend our Christmas Eve yet?
